vote.title: Authorize the second of two, twelve-month renewal options to the contract with Health Services of North Texas, Inc. in the amount of $648,084.00 to provide scattered site housing assistance for persons with HIV/AIDS for the period October 1, 2021 through September 30, 2022 - Not to exceed $648,084.00, from $1,323,529.00 to $1,971,613.00 - Financing:  2021-22 Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS Grant Fund
vote.description: Authorize the second of two, twelve-month renewal options to the contract with Health Services of North Texas, Inc. in the amount of $648,084.00 to provide scattered site housing assistance for persons with HIV/AIDS for the period October 1, 2021 through September 30, 2022 - Not to exceed $648,084.00, from $1,323,529.00 to $1,971,613.00 - Financing:  2021-22 Housing Opportunities for Persons with AIDS Grant Fund
